programme.title: URI - The Surgical Strike
programme.desc: Inspired by true events, URI – The Surgical Strike chronicles the Indian Army’s 2016 surgical strike on terror launchpads across the Line of Control in Pakistan-occupied Kashmir. Led by Major Vihaan Singh Shergill, the mission is carried out as retaliation for the deadly Uri base camp attack. With intense training, strategic execution, and nationalistic fervor, the film is a gripping military action drama showcasing courage and patriotism.

programme.title: Hamari Adhuri Kahani
programme.desc: Directed by Mohit Suri, this romantic drama features Emraan Hashmi and Vidya Balan. The story delves into the complexities of relationships, societal norms, and the sacrifices made for love.

programme.title: Gadar 2
programme.desc: Directed by Anil Sharma, Gadar 2 continues the saga of Tara Singh (Sunny Deol) and Sakeena (Ameesha Patel). Set against the backdrop of the Indo-Pakistani War of 1971, the film follows Tara's daring mission to save his imprisoned son, Jeete, blending intense action with emotional depth.

programme.title: Hamari Adhuri Kahani
programme.desc: Directed by Mohit Suri, this romantic drama features Emraan Hashmi and Vidya Balan. The story delves into the complexities of relationships, societal norms, and the sacrifices made for love.

programme.title: Gadar 2
programme.desc: Directed by Anil Sharma, Gadar 2 continues the saga of Tara Singh (Sunny Deol) and Sakeena (Ameesha Patel). Set against the backdrop of the Indo-Pakistani War of 1971, the film follows Tara's daring mission to save his imprisoned son, Jeete, blending intense action with emotional depth.

programme.title: URI - The Surgical Strike
programme.desc: Inspired by true events, URI – The Surgical Strike chronicles the Indian Army’s 2016 surgical strike on terror launchpads across the Line of Control in Pakistan-occupied Kashmir. Led by Major Vihaan Singh Shergill, the mission is carried out as retaliation for the deadly Uri base camp attack. With intense training, strategic execution, and nationalistic fervor, the film is a gripping military action drama showcasing courage and patriotism.

programme.title: Hamari Adhuri Kahani
programme.desc: Directed by Mohit Suri, this romantic drama features Emraan Hashmi and Vidya Balan. The story delves into the complexities of relationships, societal norms, and the sacrifices made for love.

programme.title: Faltu
programme.desc: F.A.L.T.U (short for Fakirchand and Lakirchand Trust University) is a youth-centric comedy-drama that follows a group of friends who, after being rejected by traditional colleges, decide to invent their own fake institution to satisfy their parents. Unexpectedly, the college becomes popular among similarly “non-performing” students seeking a second chance. Starring Jackky Bhagnani, Riteish Deshmukh, and Arshad Warsi, the film is a commentary on India’s rigid education system and encourages thinking outside the box.

programme.title: Simmba
programme.desc: Simmba follows the story of Sangram "Simmba" Bhalerao, a corrupt and flamboyant police officer who enjoys the perks of his position until a personal tragedy forces him to rethink his choices. Transforming into a man of justice, Simmba takes on a powerful criminal nexus. With high-octane action, emotional drama, and punchy dialogues, this Rohit Shetty directorial stars Ranveer Singh and Sara Ali Khan in a thrilling narrative of redemption.
